tool_description: Generate an Image Screenshot from a URL. Handles width, heightCustom JavaScript code, specific CSS Selector to screenshot and multiple image formats (png, jpg, gif, webp, jp2 and tiff)
name: Screenshotty
title: Screenshotty

api_list.name: TakeScreenshotGET
api_list.description: Receives a URL, takes the screenshot and return the image

optional_parameters.name: omitBackground
optional_parameters.description: Turn non colored parts of the background transparent in the screenshot

optional_parameters.name: readyEvent
optional_parameters.description: Which browser event to wait before taking the screenshot.

optional_parameters.name: screenshotWidth
optional_parameters.description: The screenshot clip width (leave blank if you want full page screenshot)

optional_parameters.name: screenshotHeight
optional_parameters.description: The screenshot clip height (leave blank if you want full page screenshot)

optional_parameters.name: preRenderCode
optional_parameters.description: Code to execute before taking the screenshot

optional_parameters.name: viewportHeight
optional_parameters.description: The screenshot website desired viewport height

optional_parameters.name: viewportWidth
optional_parameters.description: The screenshot website desired viewport height

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The website to take the screenshot

optional_parameters.name: screenshotY
optional_parameters.description: The screenshot Y clip position (leave blank if you want full page screenshot)

optional_parameters.name: cookies
optional_parameters.description: A JSON Object with cookies to be used in the requested page. It should have a pattern of {"Header Name": "Header Value"}

optional_parameters.name: selectorToScreenshot
optional_parameters.description: CSS Selector to screenshot in the page (defaults to the entire page)

optional_parameters.name: html
optional_parameters.description: A html code to use instead of a page to take the screenshot from (You are required to send a "html" OR a "url")

optional_parameters.name: responseType
optional_parameters.description: Which way should the response be received

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Which image format should be returned

optional_parameters.name: screenshotX
optional_parameters.description: The screenshot X clip position (leave blank if you want full page screenshot)

optional_parameters.name: httpHeaders
optional_parameters.description: A JSON Object with httpHeaders to be sent to the requested page. It should have a pattern of {"Header Name": "Header Value"}
